timeline.bodyText:
The maven plugin configuration in pluginManagement for the SpotBugs maven plugin has a dependency override for its transitive dependency to SpotBugs itself. Maybe the explicit override is not needed anymore.
I wonder if the dependabot notifies if the transitive dependency gets outdated. In that case it is probably OK to leave the configuration in pluginManagement as it is.
timeline.author: bvdzwet

timeline.message:
